summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2551, for the improvement of 6th Avenue Northeast from East 53rd Street to East 55th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of concrete walks and by doing the necessary grading and constructing curbs and gutters and providing for the necessary surface drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 29614 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
